title: Sports Marketing Research Intern - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Marketing Research Intern Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Provide daily support to the Sports Marketing, Public Relations Division for all research needs. Interface with department to fulfill research needs that include daily requests and reports for assigned clients. Proactively update weekly, monthly, quarterly, seasonal reports and presentations various analyses.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
